words.def: someone who has won first place in a competition

Pertaining to the Cham people or their language.
temporary living quarters specially built by the army for soldiers
meat cut from the thigh of a hog (usually smoked)
committee formed by a special-interest group to raise money for their favorite political candidates

a waterproof raincoat made of rubberized fabric
a diagrammatic representation of the earth's surface (or part of it)
a river in east central England that flows past Cambridge to join the Ouse River
the basic unit of electric current adopted under the Systeme International d'Unites
(astronomy) the angular distance of a celestial point measured westward along the celestial equator from the zenith crossing

an informal term for a father
